name: Zombie Rush (Waddle Games) (Waddle Games)
description:
Zombie Rush is a fast shooter game where you have to survive levels and fight zombies.

Controls:

A+D = Left + Right movement

H = Use healing potion

X = Equip shield (if you have $150, it will buy it and equip it)

Mouse Click = Shoot

R = Reload

S = Open shop (buy new weapons) M = Close shop (buy new weapons)

W = switch weapon (switch weapon through already bought weapons)

P = Pause Q = Unpause

Press and Hold Down Arrow for laser scope

Need help or more information? Please contact me!

Scratch version of this game: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/679372337/

Enjoy the game, and rate it! (And also follow me? Pls? :) )
